venue.address_1: Gowen's Corner Plaza at Route 33 and Bayside
venue.name: The KRI Center for Consciousness Studies

item.description:
We're starting a new meetup for anyone who would enjoy reading/discussing books of
a spiritual/metaphysical nature, the last Tuesday of every month, 7:00 pm, at the KRI Center in Greenland.  There is no fee for participation, but as the Center survives on your generosity donations are always greatly appreciated!

Hosted by Vally Mandic.

For the first meeting I'd like us to discuss which book(s) we would like to start with.   I will bring some suggestions and ask that others do the same.  Feel free to email me with thoughts, concerns or suggestions!  Vallyv@comcast.net
item.name: Book Club!
